name: Edouard Souan
bio: I write javascript and other languages professionally. I love to learn and share with others.

name: Eliza Marcum
bio: I'm a software engineer, educator and perpetual optimist.  I've been programming in Ruby professionally for over 10 years, and taught Ruby/Rails for 4 of those years.

name: Emilie Humbert
bio: I'm a self-taught front-end developer working mainly with JavaScript and React. I believe that learning is a lifelong process and would love to help others on their journey.

name: Eric Chiu
bio: I am a software engineer, workshop instructor, and jogger. I love JavaScript and Golang. Currently learning more about Golang and hope to use it to switch my NodeJS backend for Go.
